para.span: 因为对数据透视表进行编程可能会很复杂，所以，最方便的做法是将数据透视表操作录制到宏中，然后再修订所录制的宏代码。

span.span: Because PivotTable report programming can be complex, it’s generally easiest to record PivotTable report actions and then revise the recorded code.

para.span: 若要录制宏，请在"工具"菜单上指向"宏"，然后单击"录制新宏"。

summary.span: 在基于 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表中的所有已编辑的单元格上执行回写操作。

span.span: Performs a writeback operation for all edited cells in a PivotTable report based on an OLAP data source.

para.span: 该方法将针对自上次提交应用更改操作以来在数据透视表的值区域中进行的所有更改，或者如果从未执行过提交应用更改而创建了数据透视表，该方法将执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句。

span.span: The method will execute an UPDATE CUBE statement for all changes made in the values area of the PivotTable since the last apply changes operation was committed, or since the PivotTable was created if committing apply changes has never been performed.

para.span: 如果对基于非 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表执行此方法，那么将生成运行时错误。

span.span: This method generates a run-time error if it is executed on a PivotTable report based on a non-OLAP data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DiscardChanges() runtime managed

summary.span: 放弃基于 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表中经过编辑的单元格中的所有更改。

span.span: Discards all changes in the edited cells of a PivotTable report based on an OLAP data source.

para.span: 对于基于 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表，此方法删除在值单元格中输入的所有值和公式，然后运行数据透视表更新操作从数据源中检索最新值。

span.span: For a PivotTable report based on an OLAP data source, the method removes all values and formulas entered in value cells, and then runs a PivotTable update operation to retrieve the latest values from the data source.

para.span: 它将数据源值设置为空引用， (编辑的所有值单元格的 Visual Basic) 中为 Nothing，并且还会对 OLAP 服务器执行 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句。

span.span: It sets the data source value to a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) for all value cells that are edited, and also executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP server.

para.span: 如果尝试对基于非 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表执行此方法，则会生成运行时错误。

span.span: If you try to execute this method for a PivotTable report based on a non-OLAP data source, this method generates a run-time error.

summary.span: 如果对数值轴的 OLAP 提供程序的查询中包括非空 MDX 关键字，则返回 True。在结果集中，OLAP 提供程序不返回空列。如果省略非空关键字，则返回 False。Boolean 类型，可读写。

span.span: Returns True when the non-empty MDX keyword is included in the query to the OLAP provider for the value axis. The OLAP provider will not return empty columns in the result set. Returns False when the non-empty keyword is omitted. Read/write Boolean.

para.span: 数据透视表必须与一个联机分析处理 (OLAP) 数据源相连，以避免运行时错误。

span.span: The PivotTable must be connected to an Online Analytical Processing (OLAP) data source to avoid a run-time error.

span.span: Returns True when the non-empty MDX keyword is included in the query to the OLAP provider for the category axis. The OLAP provider will not return empty rows in the result set. Returns False when the non-empty keyword is omitted. Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableWriteback { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置是否对指定的数据透视表启用写回数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets whether writing back to the data source is enabled for the specified PivotTable.

value.span: 如果 为指定的数据透视表启用了写回数据源，则其返回值 true;否则为 false。

span.span: true if writing back to the data source is enabled for the specified PivotTable; otherwise, false.
The default value is false.

para.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 对于 OLAP 数据源，将 属性设置为 true 可启用写回，并禁用用户覆盖数据透视表数据区域中的值时 发出警报。

span.span: For OLAP data sources, setting to the property to true to enables writeback and disables the alert for when the user overwrites values in the data area of the PivotTable.

para.span: 对于非 OLAP 数据源，将该属性设置为 true 可启用代码回写，还允许用户更改以前无法更改 的数据值。

span.span: For non-OLAP data sources, setting the property to true enables write-back in code, and also allows the user to change data values that previously could not be changed.

para.span: 对象的 和 属性不能同时设置为true。

span.span: The and properties of the object cannot be set to true at the same time.

para.span: 如果该属性设置为 true，然后将该属性设置为 true，则会自动将该属性设置为 false，刷新数据透视表，并且对数据值执行的任何编辑 操作都会丢失。

span.span: If the property is set to true and then the property is set to true, the property is set to false automatically, the PivotTable is refreshed, and any editing performed on data values is lost.

para.span: 如果该属性设置为 true，然后将该属性设置为 true，则该属性将自动设置为 false，不刷新数据透视表，并还原 数据源值。

span.span: If the property is set to true and then the property is set to true, the property is set to false automatically, the PivotTable is not refreshed, and the data source values are restored.

para.span: 对于非 OLAP 数据源，设置此属性将会生成运行时错误。

span.span: For non-OLAP data sources, setting this property generates a run-time error.

span.span: Setting this property to False can optimize performance for fields with many items, and it also allows users who do not want custom list-based sorting to avoid it.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool VisualTotals { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果 (数据) 数据透视表 (联机分析处理) ，则默认值为True，以在视图中隐藏项目后重新计算总计。

span.span: True (default) to enable Online Analytical Processing (OLAP) PivotTables to recalculate the total after an item has been hidden from view.

summary.span: 读/写 Boolean。

span.span: Read/write Boolean.

para.span: 在非 OLAP 数据透视表中，如果隐藏了项目，则将重新进行汇总以只反映数据透视表中剩余的可见项目。在 OLAP 数据透视表中，汇总将在服务器上进行，因此无论数据透视表中是否隐藏了项目，都不会影响汇总。但是，如果 OLAP 数据透视表的 VisualTotals 属性为 False，那么 OLAP 数据透视表的结果将与非 OLAP 数据透视表的结果相匹配。

span.span: In non-OLAP PivotTables, if you hide an item, the total is recomputed to reflect only the items that remain visible in the PivotTable. In an OLAP PivotTable, the total is computed on the server and is therefore unaffected by whether any items are hidden in the PivotTable view. However, if the VisualTotals property is set to False for an OLAP PivotTable, then the results of the OLAP PivotTable will match those of the non-OLAP PivotTable.

para.span: 对于 OLAP 数据透视表，将 VisualTotals 属性设置为 True（默认值）时，其工作方式与非 OLAP 数据透视表中描述的一样。

span.span: For OLAP PivotTables, a VisualTotals property setting of True (default) works the same way as described for non-OLAP PivotTables.

para.span: 所有新的数据透视表的 VisualTotals 属性返回 True。

span.span: The VisualTotals property returns True for all new PivotTables.

para.span: 但是，如果您在当前版本的 Microsoft Excel中打开工作簿，并且已在早期版本的 Excel 中创建数据透视表，则 VisualTotals属性将返回False。

span.span: However, if you open a workbook in the current version of Microsoft Excel and the PivotTable had been created in a previous version of Excel, the VisualTotals property will return False.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool VisualTotalsForSets { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置是否将筛选的项目包括在指定数据透视表的命名集总数中。

span.span: Gets or sets whether to include filtered items in the totals of named sets for the specified PivotTable.

value.span: 如果包含指定数据透视表命名集总计中的筛选项，则其为true;否则为false。

span.span: true if filtered items in the totals of named sets for the specified PivotTable are included; otherwise, false.
The default is false

para.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 如果已筛选项目包含在命名集的总计中，则其值为 true;否则为 false。

span.span: true if filtered items are included in the totals for named sets; otherwise false.

para.span: 此属性的默认值为 false。

span.span: The default value of this property is false.

para.span: 在基于 OLAP 数据源的数据透视表中，可配置数据透视表中命名集的总计是否将包含已筛选的项目。

span.span: In a PivotTable based on an OLAP data source, you can configure whether totals for named sets in the PivotTable will include items that have been filtered.

para.span: 该属性的设置对应于"数据透视表选项"对话框的"总计筛选器"选项卡上的"在设置总计中包括 & 筛选的项目"复选框。

span.span: The setting of the property corresponds to the Include filtered items in set totals check box on the Totals & Filters tab of the PivotTable Options dialog box.
